title: Love Steaks
writer: Jakob Lass (screenplay), Ines Schiller (screenplay), Timon Schaeppi (screenplay), Nico Woche (screenplay), Timon Schaeppi, Jakob Lass, Nico Woche, Ines Schiller
plot: A luxury hotel. Steaks frizzle, muffintops getting massaged. Clemens (rare) joins the wellness area as a rookie. Lara (well-done) needs to assert herself in the kitchen pack. The elevator brings the two of them together. Hanging in dependence. They encounter each other, until they clash.
